import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin', templateUrl: './admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin.component.css'] }) export class AdminComponent { isMenuOpen: boolean = false; toggleMenu() { this.isMenuOpen = !this.isMenuOpen; } }
